sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Update the value of a Catalog Item variable.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.copied_from_name: Copy of Update Catalog Item Vari
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: This action is used to update the variables of any requested item. Inputs required: - Requested Item [Glide Record] - Catalog Item [Reference Catalog Item] - Variables and its values [Dynamic template, that depends on the catalog item]
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Update Catalog Item Variable - Enhanced
